string.text: Yo, Ashot, are you gonna bring that over here or what?
That will be 20 RU!
You cheapskate! ...All right, get them from the commandant..
Come again?
So how 'bout it, Ashot?
If you want it, you get it, ok? Move your ass!
You're a real jerk, you know that? You're just standing around there, doing nothing all day!
Hey, you go suck my--
Cut the bullshit, you bozos! You're making the place sound like a used car dealership!!
Hey Mr. Fix-it! We got a used gun, you have a look?
That will be 20 RU.
Hey come on. Yesterday's joke no funny today!
Alright bring your stupid gun over here.
I no can leave my shop alone, you come to me, eh?
How 'bout you just use that damn gun right in your shop in the most unnatural way possible?
Hey- Ashot, Yar! Both of you shut the hell up! Your yapping is worse than my mother's. I can't take it anymore!
Hey Yar!
Yup?
Look what I got in here.
What you got in there, Ashot?
Come here and see!
You got nothing that would impress even a little girl. No, you come over. I've got something to show you, or should I stick it out for you to see?
I no have microscope...!
Have you both lost your freaking minds?! What is this a dick measuring contest? SHUT THE HELL UP NOW!
